result.reason: Feature request for plugin support; groundwork appears to exist in mRemoteNG.Plugins project.
result.approach: Expand mRemoteNG.Plugins interfaces, implement a plugin loader/manager in the core app to discover and initialize plugins, and add hooks for UI/connection interaction.
